entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
